### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using connect_entities but being unable to connect
- Ensure that the required connection points are not blocked before attempting to connect entities.
- Change the positions of entities to unblock connections if necessary.

### Errors when placing entities into a tile which is occupied by another entity or water
- Ensure that the target position is not occupied by another entity or water before attempting to place an entity.
- Try a different location if the target position is occupied.

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available in the inventory before attempting to craft an item.
- Craft or obtain the required ingredients if they are not available.

### Errors when getting entities due to incorrect position
- Ensure that the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to get it.
- Check the position of the entity and try again if it is incorrect.

### Errors when connecting entities due to incorrect source
- Ensure that the source is either an Entity, Position, or EntityGroup before attempting to connect entities.
- Check the source and try again if it is incorrect.

### Errors when placing pipes due to insufficient pipes in inventory
- Ensure that there are enough pipes in the inventory before attempting to place a pipe.
- Craft or obtain more pipes if necessary.

### Errors when placing entities due to invalid position
- Ensure that the position is valid before attempting to place an entity.
- Check the position and try again if it is invalid.

### Errors when getting steam engine due to incorrect position
- Ensure that the steam engine exists at the specified position before attempting to get it.
- Check the position of the steam engine and try again if it is incorrect.

### Errors when placing steam engine due to invalid arguments
- Ensure that the arguments passed to the place_entity function are valid.
- Check the arguments and try again if they are invalid.

### Errors when checking offshore
